name: Running in the 3020's
description:
Tutorial:
Press space bar and release it to jump, the more you press it, the higher the jump.
Avoid getting hit by the cars.
Credits:

Code and graphics:  Anfi (me)
Music:  https://www.free-stock-music.com/vyra-defense-matrix.html
Font: Cave Story

Installation:
If you play on windows you can just run the .exe file and play

If you play on Linux you have type: chmod +x "Running in the 3020's.x86_64"
before you run the game
